publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1527 Malcolm Chisholm: Tobacco Advertising and Promotions Bill - UK Legislation—That the Parliament endorses the need to ban tobacco advertising and promotion in Scotland as set out in the Tobacco Advertising and Promotion Bill and agrees that the relevant provisions in the Bill should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Susan Deacon*
